name: Image - Responsive
description: A no thrills 100% width responsive image.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Image
attribute_definition_groups.description: The images to be displayed, use the largest image size necessary for each layout. If uploading a 2x image, the 1x version will automatically be created.

attribute_definitions.name: Mobile Image
attribute_definitions.description: If no images are selected for tablet or desktop, this mobile image will be used for all sizes.

attribute_definitions.name: Tablet Image
attribute_definitions.description: If no image is selected, the mobile image will be used.

attribute_definitions.name: Desktop Image
attribute_definitions.description: If no image is selected, the tablet image will be used if available. If no tablet image is available, the mobile image will be used.

attribute_definitions.name: Image Alt Text
attribute_definitions.description: Leave blank only if the image is described by text directly adjecent to the image in the HTML structure, or if the image is solely decorational and adds no additional meaning or context to the page.

attribute_definitions.name: Lazy Load Image?
attribute_definitions.description: If the image will not be rendering above the fold, it is recommended to enable lazy loading.

attribute_definition_groups.name: Modal Button Position
attribute_definition_groups.description: The modal button position within the image

attribute_definitions.name: Position
attribute_definitions.description: The position of the modal button within the image
